analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#509-512) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#602-638)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#717-738)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#813-831)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#834-846)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#914-918) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol:
	Contract CrowdsaleTokenController has payable functions:
	 - proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#650-670):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#665-668)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#668-669)

Reentrancy in Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1095-1140):
	External calls:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1109-1112)
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1117-1123)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensPaid (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1124-1127)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#215-225):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#217-221)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#221-222)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#232-246):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#241-242)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#242-243)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#244-245)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#949-957) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#956)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#877) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#920-924)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1109-1112)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1117-1123)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(bounty0xToken.transfer(investorAddress,bntyCompensation)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#1129-1132)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#914-918)
	- /unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#916-918

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#118)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xde9c81e767f7df2f613f046f64ed7bce75166b5f.sol#477-480)
